name: Clean My Plate
description:
Press D to rotate your plate and SPACE to push food! Points are deducted if food hits the ground! Throwing food is great, but what's even cooler is volunteering and donating, consider donating to provide a meal to someone in need! Check out the links below for more info!

FEED THE CHILDREN

WORLD CENTRAL KITCHEN INCORPORATED

THE UNITED NATIONS WORLD FOOD PROGRAMME
